basic_information.scholarship_name: Joe and Laverne Patterson Endowed Scholarship for Elementary Educators
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Eligible for full disbursement if graduating in December

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a degree in Early Childhood or Elementary Education. Eligibility Requirements Junior or senior standing and admitted to Teacher Education in Elementary Education or Early Childhood Education Programs Minimum of 3.2 GPA Personal letter demonstrating strong interest in teaching reading One letter of recommendation from faculty Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
